Question & Options:
In the context of music for the movie 'Spider-Man 2' (2004), which of the following statements are true regarding the relationship between Christopher Young and Hellraiser?
Options:
A. A. Christopher Young composed the score for Hellraiser.
B. B. Danny Elfman was asked to imitate Christopher Young's work from Hellraiser.
C. C. The cue from Hellraiser was licensed for use in Spider-Man 2.
D. D. Elfman successfully imitated Young's cue from Hellraiser.
